messages.message: Hi team, at what point will we be bringing back prov tracking in build mode. It was a really talking point to our customers that currently are playing with LLM and know its hard to get prov tracking to work

prov tracking still exists in build mode

however, we rely on the model to return provenance information for the extracted values, and sometimes the model doesnâ€™t return any provenance info
hmm, it doesnt seem to work at all anymore
who would be the right person to tag here? @Kathy Wu ?
hm that's weird, can you send the doc(s) you're using and what env you're on? prov tracking should still work for everything
It was on 10k documents, does it work with long docs? maybe i should preference that
ah, yes provenance tracking often doesn't work on long docs :disappointed: that's an area of improvement we're working on
We have it working within refiner so curious why we dont use the bboxes that come back from converse mode

the provenance tracking for converse mode and build mode is quite different, i think

is your refiner using converse mode? not build mode extraction?
correct but wouldnt advance mode be very simular to converse

nope, advanced mode still uses the build-mode extraction logic

the prompt wrapper in advanced mode is just more lightweight, compared to the default mode
